function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interruption of school nutrition programs","Impact":"Increased food insecurity in vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement alternative food distribution programs and support for families","Technologies":"Food distribution systems","People":"Children, families","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community organizations"},{"Description":"Unhealthy household environment and limited access to clean water and safe sanitation services in urban slums","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improving access to clean water, safe sanitation services, and hygiene education","Technologies":"Water purification systems, sanitation infrastructure","People":"Residents of urban slums","Owner":"Local government, NGOs, community organizations"},{"Description":"Diverted funds and priorities affecting WASH interventions","Impact":"Delayed progress in protecting human health and preventing undernutrition","Mitigation":"Reallocate resources and prioritize WASH interventions, implement evidence-informed strategies for action","Technologies":"WASH infrastructure, evidence-based interventions","People":"Communities at risk of undernutrition and infectious diseases","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
